dct_title_s: North America : drawn from the latest & best authorities
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Longitute west from London." In upper margin: Engrav'd for Guthrie's new geographical grammar. The first edition of Guthrie's New geographical, historical and commercial grammar appeared in 1770, with maps by Thomas Kitchin; editions from 1794 onwards had maps by John Russell. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers, v. 2, p. 235.
